mapper.select: select aidx, m_phone, reserve_yn from reservation_info where m_phone=#{m_phone} and aidx=#{aidx}
select ridx from reservation_info where m_phone=#{m_phone} and aidx=#{aidx} and visit_date=#{visit_date} and visit_time=#{visit_time}
select ridx, rt.aidx, apt_name as an, visit_date, visit_time, m_name, visit_in, m_phone, reserve_yn from reservation_info as rt join type_info as tt on rt.aidx = tt.aidx where ridx=#{ridx};

select ridx, rt.aidx, apt_name as aptnm, visit_date, visit_time, visit_in from reservation_info as rt join type_info as tt on rt.aidx = tt.aidx where m_phone=#{m_phone} and reserve_yn = 'Y' order by ridx desc
mapper.update: update reservation_info set reserve_yn = 'N' where ridx=#{ridx} and m_phone=#{m_phone}
